remarks: Re-index an indexed union.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 6-Apr-2017.)
statement:
iunrdx.1 $e |- ( ph -> F : A -onto-> C ) $.
iunrdx.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ y = ( F ` x ) ) -> D = B ) $.
iunrdx $p |- ( ph -> U_ x e. A B = U_ y e. C D ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B y $.
$d C x y $.
$d D x $.
$d F x y $.
$d ph x y $.
